description: Dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.title: Updates into BillSummary table PER MINUTE
Inserts into rejectevent table PER MINUTE
Inserts and updates into FormattingRequest table (BDW) per second
API SUCCESS vs FAIL calls per second

matcher.options: Work items in the running status

sortBy.displayName: Work items in the running status

targets.expr: sum by(job_type, job_status) (sql_pg_jobs_status_v2{job_status!="4-completed", job_type!="Unloaded Event Rating"})

panels.title: Number of calls by user per second
Total SQL time per user, milliseconds per second
CPU time per user, milliseconds per second
IO time per user, milliseconds per second

targets.expr: sum by(query) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col="calls", query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[1m])) / 60 > 0

panels.title: Number of calls by query per second

matcher.options: select /*+ ordered index(cprd custprodratingdiscount_uk1) use_nl (cprd)*/ t.event_num, cprd.account_num from tmpdiscountguiding t cross join custprodratingdiscount cprd where cprd.customer_ref = t.customer_ref and cprd.aggregation_level = t.aggregation_level and cprd.discount_ref = t.discount_ref and cprd.start_dtm <= t.event_end_dtm and coalesce(cprd.usage_end_dtm, t.event_start_dtm) >= t.event_start_dtm and coalesce(logically_deleted_boo, 'f') = 'f' and cprd.domain_id = t.domain_id order by cprd.customer_ref, cprd.product_seq, cprd.event_discount_id, cprd.event_source, cprd.start_dtm for update

targets.expr: sum by(query) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col="total_time_ms", query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[1m])) / 60 > 0

panels.title: Total time, milliseconds per second, stacked

targets.expr: sum by(query) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col="total_cpu_time_ms", query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[1m])) / 60 > 0

panels.title: Queries by CPU time, milliseconds per second, stacked

targets.expr: sum by(query) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"total_blk_read_time_ms|total_blk_write_time_ms", query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[1m])) / 60 > 0

panels.title: IO time, milliseconds per second, stacked

targets.expr: sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"calls",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"total_time_ms",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"total_io_bytes",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"total_cpu_time_ms",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"plans",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"rows",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"plan_time_ms",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col=~"total_plan_cpu_time_ms",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col="total_blk_read_time_ms",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))

sum by(query, user_name, top) (increase(sql_pg_queries_v2{col="total_blk_write_time_ms",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range]))
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="backend_xid_age", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="xact_duration_ms", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="query_duration_ms", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="granted_locks_count", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="waiting_locks_count", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="blocking_others_count", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="blocked_by_count", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="current_subtransactions", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})
sum by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, state, user_name, wait_event, xact_start) (sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="backend_xmin_age", query!~".*rater.*|.*alloca.*"})

panels.title: Current state of selected client transactions

targets.expr: sum by(user_name, query, col, query_start, pid_text) (sql_pg_long_running_v2{col=~"backend_xmin|backend_xid", query!~".*raterdata.*", user_name!="system user"}) > 0
sum by(user_name, query, col, query_start, pid_text, ) (sql_pg_long_running_v2{col=~"backend_xmin|backend_xid", query!~".*raterdata.*", user_name!="system user"}) > 0

panels.title: Current XID and backend xmin per query per query_start

targets.expr: max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name,xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="query_duration_ms", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="xact_duration_ms", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="current_subtransactions", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="backend_xid_age", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="backend_xmin_age", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="blocked_by_count", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="blocking_others_count", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="granted_locks_count", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))
max by(backend_type, pid_text, query, query_start, user_name, xact_start) (max_over_time(sql_pg_transactions_v2{col="waiting_locks_count", query!~".*vacuum.*|.*rater.*|.*alloca.*"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Transaction log, does not reflect current state

targets.expr: sum by(query, query_start) (sql_pg_long_running_v2{col=~"current_subtransactions",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}) > 0

max by(query, pid_text, user_name) (max_over_time(sql_pg_long_running_v2{col=~"current_subtransactions",query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"}[$__range])) > 0

sum by(granted, lock_type, mode, pid, query, user_name, table_name, tuple_details, tuple_id) (sql_pg_x_locks_v2{query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"})

sum by (query) (
  label_replace(
    sql_pg_x_locks_v2{query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"},
    "query",
    "$1",
    "query",
    "^(.{100}).*"
  )
)

sum by(table_name, tuple_details) (sql_pg_x_locks_v2{tuple_details!="no details", query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"})

panels.title: Deadlocks and checksum failures PER MINUTE

targets.expr: sum by(granted, lock_type, mode, pid, query, user_name, table_name, tuple_details, tuple_id) (sql_pg_x_locks_v2{user_name!~".*costed.*", query=~"$query_include_regex", user_name=~"$user_include_regex", query!~"$query_exclude_regex", user_name!~"$user_exclude_regex"})

panels.title: Dead tuples as percentage of vacuum triggering threshold
Inserts as percentage of vacuum triggering threshold
Modifications as percentage of analyze triggering threshold
Busiest tables, operations per minute, log scale
Index and heap reads, bytes per second
Index reads from file system, bytes per second
WAL records and fpi per second
WAL writes and syncs per second

targets.legendFormat: {{node}} – Memory ready for new allocations (free + reclaimable)
{{node}} – Memory pages actively used by processes.
{{node}} - Maximum memory allocable before hitting the limit
{{node}} - Huge pages used for anonymous memory allocations
{{node}} - Active memory used by anonymous pages (~PG BE’s private memory)

panels.title: Bytes read from cache and from filesysten
Cache-miss buffers allocated, bytes per second

title: PostgreSQL Performance Troubleshooting
